import React,{useState} from 'react' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; function Login() { const [email, setEmail] = useState("") const [password, setPassword] = useState("") return (
Email address setEmail(e.target.value)} required/> We'll never share your email with anyone else. Password setPassword(e.target.value)} required/>
) } export default Login
